name: research-spike
description: Investigate a topic and synthesize findings into archivable research. Includes auto-archive step (E4).

steps.title: Investigate {{feature}}
steps.description:
Deep-dive into {{feature}}: scan the codebase, read documentation, identify patterns and integration points. SUBAGENT:Explore

Post a FINDINGS: comment on the parent bead with:
- Purpose: What was investigated
- Sources: Files, docs, and references found
- Summary: Key findings
- Recommendations: Suggested next steps

steps.title: Synthesize findings on {{feature}}
steps.description:
Consolidate research findings into a structured summary. SUBAGENT:general-purpose

Post a CHANGES: comment summarizing the synthesized output.

steps.title: Archive research on {{feature}}
steps.description:
Create an archive bead from the research findings. SUBAGENT:general-purpose

Use bd create to create an archive bead:
bd create --title "Archive: Research on {{feature}}" -l ys:archive,ys:archive:research --description "<structured findings from FINDINGS comment>"

This makes the research available for /yf:archive_process to generate permanent docs.
